Message.example: DNAT and privateZone are both ready.

CreateInstance.summary: Creates a Data Science Workshop (DSW) instance.

schema.title: 实例属性
schema.description: The instance properties.

WorkspaceId.title: 工作空间Id
WorkspaceId.description: The workspace ID. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.

InstanceName.title: 实例名称
InstanceName.description:
The instance name. The name must meet the following requirements:

*   The name can contain only letters, digits, and underscores (\_).
*   The name can be up to 27 characters in length.

EcsSpec.title: 实例对应的Ecs规格
EcsSpec.description: The ECS instance type of the instance. You can call [ListEcsSpecs](~~470423~~) to obtain the ECS instance type.

ImageId.title: 镜像Id
ImageId.description: The image ID. You can call [ListImages](~~449118~~) to obtain the image ID.

ImageUrl.title: 镜像地址
ImageUrl.description: The image address. You can call [ListImages](~~449118~~) to obtain the image address.

DatasetId.title: 数据集Id
DatasetId.description:
The dataset ID. If the dataset is read-only, you cannot change the dataset permission from read-only to read and write by using MountAccess.

You can call [ListDatasets](~~457222~~) to obtain the dataset ID. If you configure the dataset ID, you cannot configure the dataset URI.

DatasetVersion.title: 数据集版本，不填默认为v1
DatasetVersion.description: The dataset version. You must also configure DatasetId. If you leave this parameter empty, the value v1 is used by default.

Uri.title: 数据Uri，支持oss、nas、cpfs。
Uri.description:
The URI of the storage service directory, which can be directly mounted. This parameter is mutually exclusive with DatasetId.

URI formats of different types of storage:

*   OSS: oss://bucket-name.oss-cn-shanghai-internal.aliyuncs.com/data/path/
*   NAS: nas://29\*\*d-b12\*\*\*\*446.cn-hangzhou.nas.aliyuncs.com/data/path/
*   Extreme NAS: nas://29\*\*\*\*123-y\*\*r.cn-hangzhou.extreme.nas.aliyuncs.com/data/path/
*   CPFS: cpfs://cpfs-213\*\*\*\*87.cn-wulanchabu/ptc-292\*\*\*\*\*cbb/exp-290\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*03e/data/path/
*   Lingjun CPFS: bmcpfs://cpfs-290\*\*\*\*\*\*foflh-vpc-x\*\*\*\*8r.cn-wulanchabu.cpfs.aliyuncs.com/data/path/

MountPath.title: 容器内挂载路径
MountPath.description: The mount path of the dataset.

MountAccess.title: 读写权限，RW：读写，RO：只读。
MountAccess.description: The read and write permissions of the dataset. If the dataset is read-only, it cannot be changed to read and write.

Options.title: 数据挂载Options
Options.description: The custom dataset mount options. Only OSS is supported. You cannot specify OptionType at the same time. For more information, see [DSW mount configurations](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/pai/user-guide/read-and-write-dataset-data).

OptionType.description: The mount type. You cannot specify Options at the same time. This is deprecated, and you can use Options instead.

Dynamic.description:
Specifies whether to enable dynamic mounting. Default value: false.

*   Currently, only instances using general-purpose computing resources are supported.
*   Currently, only OSS datasets are supported. The mounted datasets are read-only.
*   The mount path of the dynamically mounted dataset must be a subpath of the root path. Example: /mnt/dynamic/data1/
*   A dynamically mounted dataset must be after non-dynamic datasets.

ExtendedCIDRs.description:
The extended CIDR blocks.

*   If you leave the SwitchId and ExtendedCIDRs parameters empty, the system automatically obtains all CIDR blocks in a VPC.
*   If you configure the SwitchId and ExtendedCIDRs parameters, we recommend that you specify all CIDR blocks in a VPC.

DefaultRoute.title: Default Route
DefaultRoute.description:
The default route. Valid values:

*   eth0: The default network interface is used to access the Internet through the public gateway.
*   eth1: The user's elastic network interface (ENI) is used to access the Internet through the private gateway. For more information about the configuration method, see [Enable Internet access for a DSW instance by using a private Internet NAT gateway](~~2525343~~).

items.description: The forward information. You can configure parameters such as the mapped port, gateway ID, and SSH public key.

Accessibility.title: 工作空间内是否他人可见
Accessibility.description:
The instance accessibility.

Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: The instances are accessible to all members in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: The instances are accessible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.

additionalProperties.description: The specific environment variable. After a DSW instance is started, the specific environment variable is injected into the container.

ResourceId.title: 资源Id,预付费时填写
ResourceId.description: The ID of the resource group. This parameter is configured during prepayment. For information about how to create a dedicated resource group, see [Create a dedicated resource group and purchase general computing resources](~~202827~~).

Priority.title: 优先级，在分配资源给实例时，优先级越高的实例越优先
Priority.description:
The priority based on which resources are allocated to instances. Valid values: 1 to 9.

*   1: the lowest priority.
*   9: the highest priority.

RequestedResource.title: 资源配置，弹内或者轻量化时使用

SharedMemory.title: shared memory大小
SharedMemory.description: The size of the shared memory. Unit: GB.

GPUType.title: gpu显卡类型
GPUType.description:
The GPU memory type. Valid values:

*   V100
*   A100
*   T4
*   A10
*   P100

Capacity.title: 云盘容量
Capacity.description:
If **Resource Type** is **Public Resource** or if **Resource Quota** is subscription-based general-purpose computing resources (CPU cores ≥ 2 and memory ≥ 4 GB, or configured with GPU):

Each instance has a free system disk of 100 GiB for persistent storage. **If the DSW instance is stopped and not launched for more than 15 days, the disk is cleared**. The disk can be expanded. For specific pricing, refer to the console.

**

**Warning**

*   After the expansion, you cannot reduce the storage space. Proceed with caution.

*   After the expansion, the disk is not cleared if the instance is stopped for more than 15 days. However, it will continue to incur fees.

*   If you delete the instance, the system disk is also released and the data stored in the disk is deleted. Make sure that you have backed up your data before you delete the instance.

If you need persistent storage, you can **mount a dataset** or add the OSS, NAS, or CPFS path to the **storage path**.

SubType.title: 云盘使用方式, rootfs 挂载为rootfs
SubType.description:
The cloud disk type.

*   rootfs: Mounts the disk as a system disk. The system environment is stored on the disk.

MountPath.title: 容器内挂载云盘路径
MountPath.description: The mount path of the cloud disk.

Path.title: 云盘内被挂载目录路径
Path.description: The subpath of the cloud disk that is mounted to the instance.

WorkspaceSource.title: 工作空间指向的存储，如果不指定，则依次使用NAS，CloudDisk或者本地磁盘
WorkspaceSource.description:
The storage corresponding to the working directory. You can mount disks or datasets to /mnt/workspace at the same time. OSS datasets and dynamically mounted datasets are not supported.

Valid values:

*   rootfsCloudDisk: Mount the disk to the working directory.
*   Mount path of the dataset, such as /mnt/data: Datasets in URI format only support this method.
*   Dataset ID, such as d-vsqjvs\*\*\*\*rp5l206u: If a single dataset is mounted to multiple paths, the first path is selected. We recommend that you do not use this method, use the mount path instead.

If you leave this parameter empty:

*   If the instance uses cloud disks, cloud disks are selected by default.
*   if no cloud disks are available, the first NAS or CPFS dataset is selected as the working directory.
*   If no cloud disks, and NAS or CPFS datasets are available, the host space is used.

UserId.title: 实例的使用者，可能是子账号或者主账号
UserId.description: The ID of the instance owner. Valid values: Alibaba Cloud account and RAM user.

CPU.description: The CPU affinity configuration. Only subscription instances that use general-purpose computing resources support CPU affinity configuration.

Enable.description:
Specifies whether to enable the CPU affinity feature.

*   false
*   true

ImageAuth.title: �用户私有镜像的账号密码信息，如果镜像地址是公共镜像或者归属当前账号的 ACR 镜像，则不需要填写。生成方法： ${username}:${password} base64编码后的值。
ImageAuth.description: The Base64-encoded account and password for the user's private image. The password will be hidden.

OversoldType.title:
闲时资源的类型：
ForceQuotaOverSold：只使用闲时资源
AcceptQuotaOverSold：可接受闲时资源
ForbiddenQuotaOverSold：使用保障资源

SpotStrategy.title:
抢占策略：
SpotWithPriceLimit：自定义设置抢占实例价格上限。
SpotAsPriceGo：系统自动出价，跟随当前市场实际价格。

SpotPriceLimit.title: 抢占式实例的每小时价格上限，最多支持精确到小数点后三位，抢占策略是SpotWithPriceLimit的时候必填

SpotDuration.title: 抢占式实例的保护期。默认为1，可设置为0，表示无保护期。灵骏规格无效。

SpotDiscountLimit.title: 抢占式实例的每小时折扣上限，灵骏规格必填。

schema.title: 执行结果
schema.description: The response parameters.

Success.title: 成功标志
Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Code.title: 状态码
Code.description:
The status code. Valid values:

*   InternalError: an internal error. All errors, except for parameter validation errors, are classified as internal errors.
*   ValidationError: a parameter validation error.

HttpStatusCode.title: http状态码
HttpStatusCode.description:
The HTTP status code. Valid values:

*   400
*   404
*   200

UpdateInstance.summary: Updates the properties of a DSW instance.

schema.title: 实例Id
schema.description: The instance ID. You can call [ListInstances](~~470439~~) to obtain the instance ID.

schema.title: 需要更新的实例属性
schema.description: The instance properties to be updated.

InstanceName.title: 实例名称
InstanceName.description:
The instance name. Format requirements:

*   The name can contain only letters, digits, and underscores (\_).
*   The name can be up to 27 characters in length.

EcsSpec.title: 实例对应的Ecs规格
EcsSpec.description: The ECS instance type of the instance. You can call [ListEcsSpecs](~~470423~~) to obtain the ECS instance type.

ImageId.title: 镜像Id
ImageId.description: The image ID. You can call [ListImages](~~449118~~) to obtain the image ID.

ImageUrl.title: 镜像地址
ImageUrl.description: The image address. You can call [ListImages](~~449118~~) to obtain the image address.

ExtendedCIDRs.description:
The extended CIDR blocks.

*   If you leave VSwitchId empty, this parameter is not required and the system automatically obtains all CIDR blocks in the VPC.
*   If VSwitchId is not empty, this parameter is required. Specify all CIDR blocks in the VPC.

DefaultRoute.title: Default Route
DefaultRoute.description:
The default route. Valid values:

*   eth0: The default network interface is used to access the Internet through the public gateway.
*   eth1: The user's Elastic Network Interface is used to access the Internet through the private gateway.

ForwardInfos.title: Forward Infos
ForwardInfos.description: The forward configuration of the instance.

Accessibility.title: 工作空间内是否他人可见
Accessibility.description:
The visibility of the instance.

Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: Accessible to all members in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: Accessible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.

DatasetId.title: 数据集Id
DatasetId.description:
The dataset ID. If the dataset is read-only, you cannot change the dataset pemission from read-only to read and write by using MountAccess.

You can call [ListDatasets](~~457222~~) to obtain the dataset ID. If you configure the dataset ID, you cannot configure the dataset URI.

DatasetVersion.title: 数据集版本，默认为v1
DatasetVersion.description: The dataset version. You must also configure DatasetId. If you leave this parameter empty, the value v1 is used by default.

Uri.title: 数据Uri，支持oss、nas、cpfs。
Uri.description:
The URI of the storage service directory, which can be directly mounted. This parameter is mutually exclusive with DatasetId.

URI formats of different types of storage:

*   OSS: oss://bucket-name.oss-cn-shanghai-internal.aliyuncs.com/data/path/
*   NAS: nas://29\*\*d-b12\*\*\*\*446.cn-hangzhou.nas.aliyuncs.com/data/path/
*   Extreme NAS: nas://29\*\*\*\*123-y\*\*r.cn-hangzhou.extreme.nas.aliyuncs.com/data/path/
*   CPFS: cpfs://cpfs-213\*\*\*\*87.cn-wulanchabu/ptc-292\*\*\*\*\*cbb/exp-290\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*03e/data/path/
*   Lingjun CPFS: bmcpfs://cpfs-290\*\*\*\*\*\*foflh-vpc-x\*\*\*\*8r.cn-wulanchabu.cpfs.aliyuncs.com/data/path/

MountPath.title: 容器内挂载路径
MountPath.description: The mount path of the dataset.

MountAccess.title: 读写权限，RW：读写，RO：只读。
MountAccess.description: The read and write permissions of the dataset. If the dataset is read-only, it cannot be changed to read and write.

Options.title: 数据挂载配置项
Options.description: The custom dataset mount options. Only OSS is supported. You cannot specify OptionType at the same time. For more information, see [DSW mount configurations](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/pai/user-guide/read-and-write-dataset-data).

OptionType.description: The mount type. You cannot specify Options at the same time. This is deprecated, you can use Options instead.

Dynamic.description:
Specifies whether dynamic mounting is enabled. Default value: false.

*   Currently, only instances using general-purpose computing resources are supported.
*   Currently, only OSS datasets are supported. The mounted datasets are read-only.
*   The MountPath of the dynamically mounted dataset must be a subpath of the root path. Example: /mnt/dynamic/data1/
*   A dynamically mounted dataset must be after non-dynamic datasets.

DisassociateDatasets.title: 是否删除关联数据集
DisassociateDatasets.description:
Specifies whether to delete the associated datasets.

*   true
*   false

DisassociateVpc.title: 是否删除关联用户vpc
DisassociateVpc.description: Specifies whether to delete the associated user VPC.

DisassociateForwardInfos.title: 是否删除关联端口透出信息
DisassociateForwardInfos.description: Specifies whether to delete the associated forward information.

RequestedResource.title: 资源配置，弹内或者轻量化时使用

SharedMemory.title: shared memory大小
SharedMemory.description: The shared memory size. Unit: GB.

WorkspaceSource.title: 工作空间指向的存储，如果不指定，则依次使用NAS，CloudDisk或者本地磁盘
WorkspaceSource.description:
Specifies the storage corresponding to the working directory. You can mount disks or datasets to /mnt/workspace at the same time. OSS datasets and dynamically mounted datasets are not supported.

Valid values:

*   rootfsCloudDisk: Mount disk to the working directory.
*   Mount path of the dataset, such as /mnt/data: Datasets in URI format only support this method.
*   Dataset ID, such as d-vsqjvs\*\*\*\*rp5l206u: If a single dataset is mounted to multiple paths, the first path is selected. We recommend that you do not use this method, use the mount path instead.

If you leave this parameter empty:

*   If the instance uses cloud disks, cloud disks are selected by default.
*   if no disks are available, the first NAS or CPFS dataset is selected as the working directory.
*   If no disk, NAS, or CPFS datasets is available, the host space is used.

UserId.title: 实例的使用者，可能是子账号或者主账号
UserId.description: the User ID of the instance.

Capacity.title: 云盘容量
Capacity.description:
If **Resource Type** is **Public Resource** or if **Resource Quota** is subscription-based general-purpose computing resources (CPU cores ≥ 2 and memory ≥ 4 GB, or configured with GPU):

Each instance has a free system disk quota of 100 GiB for persistent storage. **If the DSW instance is stopped and not launched for more than 15 days, the disk is cleared**. The disk can be expanded. For specific pricing, refer to the console.

**

**Warning**

*   After the expansion, you cannot reduce the storage space. Proceed with caution.

*   After the expansion, the disk is not cleared if the instance is stopped for more than 15 days. However, it will continue to incur fees.

*   If you delete the instance, the system disk is also released and the data stored in the disk is deleted. Make sure that you have backed up your data before you delete the instance.

If you need persistent storage, you can **mount a dataset** or add the OSS, NAS, or CPFS path to the **storage path**.

SubType.title: 云盘类型, rootfs 挂载为rootfs
SubType.description:
Disk type:

*   rootfs: Mounts the disk as a system disk. The system environment is stored on the disk.

Priority.title: 实例排队优先级
Priority.description:
The priority based on which resources are allocated to instances. Valid values: 1 to 9.

*   1: the lowest priority.
*   9 is the highest priority.

DisassociateDriver.title: 是否删除关联端口透出信息
DisassociateDriver.description: Specifies whether to delete the NVIDIA driver configuration.

DisassociateCredential.title: 是否删除credential注入信息。
DisassociateCredential.description: Specifies whether to delete the credential injection information.

CPU.description: The CPU affinity configuration. Only subscription instances that use general-purpose computing resources support CPU affinity configuration.

Enable.description:
Specifies whether CPU affinity is enabled.

*   true
*   false

ImageAuth.title: 用户私有镜像的账号密码信息，如果镜像地址是公共镜像或者归属当前账号的 ACR 镜像，则不需要填写。生成方法： ${username}:${password}  base64编码后的值。
ImageAuth.description: The Base64-encoded account and password for the user‘s private image. The password will be hidden.

MountAccess.title: 读写权限，RW：读写，RO：只读。

Options.title: 数据挂载的配置项
Options.description: The mount type of the dataset.

ExtendedCIDRs.description:
The extended CIDR block.

*   If you leave VSwitchId empty, this parameter is not required and the system automatically obtains all CIDR blocks in the VPC.
*   If VSwitchId is not empty, this parameter is required. Specify all CIDR blocks in the VPC.

additionalProperties.description: The user defined environment variables, injected into the container after the instance is started.

ResourceId.title: 资源Id,预付费时填写
ResourceId.description: The resource ID. This parameter is available if the billing method is subscription.

ResourceName.description:
The specification type.

*   For subscription, this is the requested CPU and memory size.
*   For pay-as-you-go, this is the selected ECS instance type.

Priority.title: 优先级，在分配资源给实例时，优先级越高的实例越优先
Priority.description: The priority based on which resources are allocated to instances.

RequestedResource.title: 资源配置，弹内或者轻量化时使用
RequestedResource.description: The resource configurations in subscription scenarios.

SharedMemory.title: shared memory大小
SharedMemory.description: The shared memory size. Unit: GB.

GPUType.title: gpu显卡类型
GPUType.description:
The GPU type. Valid values:

*   V100
*   A100
*   T4
*   A10
*   P100

items.description: You can add custom tags to an instance to mark some custom attributes.

IdleInstanceCuller.title: 实例的空闲资源回收器

CpuPercentThreshold.description: The CPU utilization threshold. Unit: percentage. Valid values: 1 to 100. If the CPU utilization of the instance is lower than this threshold, the instance is considered idle.

GpuPercentThreshold.description: The GPU utilization threshold. Unit: percentage. Valid values: 1 to 100. This parameter takes effect only if the instance is of the GPU instance type. If both CPU and GPU utilization is lower than the thresholds, the instance is considered idle.

MaxIdleTimeInMinutes.description: The maximum time duration for which the instance is idle. Unit: minutes. If the time duration for which the instance is idle exceeds this value, the system automatically stops the instance.

IdleTimeInMinutes.description: The current time duration for which the instance is idle. Unit: minutes.

GmtCreateTime.title: 快照创建时间
GmtCreateTime.description: The time when the snapshot was created.

GmtModifiedTime.title: 快照修改时间
GmtModifiedTime.description: The time when the snapshot was modified.

ReasonCode.title: 实例快照错误代码
ReasonCode.description: The error code of the instance snapshot.

ReasonMessage.title: 实例快照错误消息
ReasonMessage.description: The error message of the instance snapshot.

CloudDisks.title: 实例的云盘列表
CloudDisks.description: The cloud disks of the instance.

SubType.title: 云盘使用方式, rootfs 挂载为rootfs
SubType.description: The usage mode of the cloud disk. The value rootfs indicates that the cloud disk is used as the root file system.

MountPath.title: 容器内挂载云盘路径
MountPath.description: The mount path of the cloud disk in the container.

Path.title: 云盘内被挂载目录路径

GetInstance.title: GetInstance

schema.title: 工作空间Id
schema.description: The workspace ID. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.

schema.title: 实例名称
schema.description: The instance name.

schema.title: 资源组Id
schema.description: The resource group ID. If you leave this parameter empty, the instances in the pay-as-you-go resource group are queried. If you set this parameter to ALL, all instances are queried.

schema.title: 实例状态
schema.description:
The instance status.

Valid values:

*   Creating
*   SaveFailed
*   Stopped
*   Failed
*   ResourceAllocating
*   Stopping
*   Updating
*   Saving
*   Queuing
*   Recovering
*   Starting
*   Running
*   Saved
*   Deleting
*   EnvPreparing

The billing method.

Valid values:

*   PayAsYouGo
*   Subscription

The accessibility. Valid values:

*   PRIVATE (default): The instances are accessible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.
*   PUBLIC: The instances are accessible only to all members in the workspace.

The accelerator type.

*   CPU: Only CPU computing is used.
*   GPU: GPUs are used to accelerate computing.

ResourceId.description: The resource ID. This parameter is valid only if you set PaymentType to Subscription.

ResourceName.description:
The specifications.

*   In pay-as-you-go scenarios, the value is the specifications of the purchased ECS instance type.
*   In subscription scenarios, the value is the requested number of CPU cores and memory size.

Priority.title: 优先级，在分配资源给实例时，优先级越高的实例越优先
Priority.description: The priority based on which resources are allocated to instances. Resources are preferentially allocated to instances with higher priorities.

RequestedResource.title: 资源配置，弹内或者轻量化时使用

SharedMemory.title: shared memory大小
SharedMemory.description: The size of the shared memory.

IdleInstanceCuller.title: 实例的空闲资源回收器
IdleInstanceCuller.description: The rule for stopping idle instances.

CpuPercentThreshold.description: The CPU utilization threshold. Unit: percentage. Valid values: 1 to 100. If the CPU utilization of the instance is lower than this threshold, the instance is considered idle.

GpuPercentThreshold.description: The GPU utilization threshold. Unit: percentage. Valid values: 1 to 100. This parameter takes effect only if the instance is of the GPU instance type. If both CPU and GPU utilization is lower than the thresholds, the instance is considered idle.

MaxIdleTimeInMinutes.description: The maximum time duration for which the instance is idle. Unit: minutes. If the time duration for which the instance is idle exceeds this value, the system automatically stops the instance.

IdleTimeInMinutes.description: The time duration for which the instance is idle. Unit: minutes.

SubType.description: The cloud disk type. The value rootfs indicates that the cloud disk is used as the root file system (rootfs).

GetLifecycle.summary: Obtains the lifecycle of an instance

schema.description: The instance ID. You can call [ListInstances](~~470439~~) to obtain the instance ID.
A session refers to the process of an instance from startup to failure or shutdown. The sessionNumber indicates the offset value for the instance's session sequence.
The beginning of the time range to query.
The end of the time range to query.
The number of sessions to query.

The sorting order of the results. Valid values:

*   ASC: sorted by time in ascending order.
*   DESC: sorted by time in descending order.
The token used to share the URL.

schema.title: LifecycleResult
schema.description: The lifecycle query results.

Success.title: 成功标志
Success.description:
Indicates whether the request was successful. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Code.title: 状态码
Code.description:
The status code. Valid values:

*   InternalError: All errors, except for parameter validation errors, are internal errors.
*   ValidationError: A parameter validation error.

items.description: The list of lifecycle results. Each child item is the lifecycle of a session.

Status.description:
The status of the instance. Valid values:

*   Creating
*   SaveFailed: The instance image failed to be saved.
*   Stopped
*   Failed
*   ResourceAllocating
*   Stopping
*   Updating
*   Saving
*   Starting
*   Running
*   Saved
*   EnvPreparing: Preparing environment.
*   ArrearStopping: The service is being stopped due to overdue payments.
*   Arrearge: The service is stopped due to overdue payments.
*   Queuing
*   Recovering

ReasonCode.description: The reason code that corresponds to an event.

ReasonMessage.description: The reason message that corresponds to an event.

GmtCreateTime.description: The time the status was created, specifically the time the instance transitioned to this status (in GMT).

TotalCount.description: The total number of queried sessions.
